EmailTemplate.description: When an employee gets a ‘Prize’ recognition
EmailTemplate.name: Prize Recognition Email template for Resource
EmailTemplate.subject: RnR: Celebrating Your Winning Achievement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Resource__c},
We hope this message finds you well. Congratulations! Your recent participation in {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Project__c} and your outstanding performance have earned you a well-deserved prize.
Your dedication and competitive spirit have not only made you a winner but also brought honor to our team. {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Recognization_By__c} has nominated you for this prize and we are proud to recognize and celebrate your achievement.
Congratulations on this remarkable achievement!
Best Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
